Package view

Class WordleGUIView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
view.WordleGUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class WordleGUIView extends javafx.application.Application implements Observer
Author:
adityaj2003 Assignment: Assignment 4 File: WordleGUIView.java Course: CSC 335; Spring 2022 Purpose: This is the WordleGUiView which is the gui view module for wordle MVC. This is responsible for running the wordle game in GUI view. It extends application and implements the Observer class

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      This function is the main function which starts the gui view and takes input from the user through buttons and textEvents.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      Stage - : It takes a stage as input and adds different nodes

    • updateColor

      public void updateColor(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane pane, javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Scene scene, String word, controller.WordleController controller)
      This function updates the color of the labels and onscreen buttons. It takes in the pane and scene as parameter and changes color of labels and letter buttons based on the progress array which contains index_letters enum describing whether the letters in guesssed word are correct, incorrect or correct but wrong place
      Parameters:
      pane - : This is the GridPane in which we are adding labels
      stage - : This is the stage of the application which is shown when launching
      scene - : This is the scene which contains all labels and buttons
      word - : This is the word that the user has guessed
      controller - : Controller instance for this game

    • enterGuess

      public void enterGuess(controller.WordleController controller, model.WordleModel model, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane pane, javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      This function is called when user presses enter to mark that he is guessing the current word input. It calls controller's makeGuess and changes everything in the gui after the guess changes the progress and guessed characters in model. It updates the numGuess variable and resets the current guess array.
      Parameters:
      controller - : Controller instance for this iteration of game
      model - : Model instance for this iteration of game
      pane - : GridPane which contains all labels and buttons
      stage - : Stage is the stage which is shown when launching application
      scene - : Scene which is set to stage and keeps refreshing

    • deleteLetter

      public void deleteLetter(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane pane, javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      This function is called when backspace is entered. Deletes one letter from the word input in the gui. Resets the label which displays the guess, the user is typing currently. by the user
      Parameters:
      pane -
      stage -
      scene -

    • addLetter

      public void addLetter(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane pane, javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      This functions is called when the user enters letters either through buttons or key events. Displays the letters entered by the user by updating labels of each letter that is added and adding the input letter to letter array inputText.
      Parameters:
      event - : Event is the keyEvent which gives us the letter user pressed
      pane - : GridPane containing all labels and buttons
      stage - : Stage which is shown when application is launched
      scene - : Scene which is set and refreshed after each event

    • update

      public void update(Observable model, Object arg)
      Update function which updates progress and guessedCharacters as guiView is observer of model class
